Any payment card information you use to make a purchase on the Service is collected and processed directly by our payment processors, such as PayPal or Stripe, or Square, etc .
They may use your payment data in accordance with its privacy policy, e.g., https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/privacy-full or https://stripe.com/privacy  or  https://squareup.com/gb/en/legal/general/privacy .

Under California's Shine the Light law (California Civil Code Section 1798.83), California residents may ask companies with whom they have formed a business relationship primarily for personal, family or household purposes to provide the names of third parties to which they have disclosed certain personal information (as defined under the Shine the Light law) during the preceding calendar year for their own direct marketing purposes, and the categories of personal information disclosed.
